data.title: West Baden Springs Hotel at French Lick Resort
data.meta_description: Treat yourself to a 4-star hotel experience when you book a stay at West Baden Springs Hotel in French Lick, Indiana.
data.text:
Great news: all the glass panels atop our dome have been replaced, the protective coverings have been removed, and itâ€™s looking brighter and better than ever in our atrium!

Additional roof work is ongoing as we enter the final stage of repairs following a hailstorm on June 25, 2023.

Please pardon our noise during construction hours: Monday-Friday, from 8:45am to 6pm, until further notice.
